  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2192</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Erosion and Sedimentation in the formation of Glaciers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abnutzung und Sedimentbildung in der Anordnung der
Gletscher</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Érosion et sédimentation dans la formation des 
glaciers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Erosão e sedimentation na formação das 
geleiras</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Erosione e sedimentazione nella formazione dei 
ghiacciai</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάβρωση και ιζηματογένεση στο σχηματισμό των 
παγετώνων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Erosión y sedimentación en la formación de 
glaciares</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An demonstration of the erosion and sedimentation process which lead to the formation of glaciers during the Ice age.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">geology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">glaciers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">geomorphologic phenomenon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">earth sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Demonstration der Abnutzung und 
Sedimentbildungprozeß, die zu die Anordnung der Gletscher während 
der Eiszeit führen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une démonstration de l'érosion et processus de 
sédimentation qui mènent à la formation des glaciers pendant la 
période glaciaire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma demonstração da erosão e processo do 
sedimentation que conduzam à formação das geleiras durante a idade 
de gelo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una dimostrazione dell'erosione e processo di 
sedimentazione che conducono alla formazione dei ghiacciai durante 
l'età di ghiaccio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια επίδειξη της διαδικασίας διάβρωσης και 
ιζηματογένεσης που οδηγεί στο σχηματισμό των παγετώνων κατά τη 
διάρκεια της ηλικίας πάγου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una demostración de la erosión y proceso de la 
sedimentación que conducen a la formación de glaciares durante la 
edad de hielo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
